author: MSNBC
title: At-home abortion medication requests soared after Texas restrictions
description: After Texas banned abortions around 6 weeks last September, requests for abortion medications sent by mail increased significantly.
content:
Requests for abortion pills skyrocketed in Texas after a state law that bans abortions around six weeks of pregnancy went into effect last September. 
A study published Friday in JAMA Network Open, … [+3459 chars]
